title: scribe configuration
description: Configuration file schema for the scribe CLI.

model.description: Whisper model name or absolute path. When a name is given, scribe looks for ~/.scribe/models/{name}.bin.

recordingDir.description: Default output directory for recordings. Defaults to ~/.scribe/recordings/.

language.description: Language hint for transcription (ISO 639-1). Set to 'auto' for automatic detection.

noMic.description: Disable microphone input and capture system audio only.

noSystem.description: Disable system audio and capture microphone input only.
